-1.title: Episode dated 19 February 2017
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Pies
1.plot: Pies are anything but humble in the hands of these innovative bakers. Eateries in Seattle, San Francisco and New York City are visited.

2.title: Breakfast Sweets
2.plot: We've found the best reasons to roll out of bed in the morning.

3.title: Cakes
3.plot: In this episode we are celebrating cakes in every form, flavor and size.

4.title: Updated Classics
4.plot: Trigger your fondest food memories with flavors you never remembered. Updated classic sweets include a cacao caramel corn; Meyer lemon Shaker pie; and cheesecake.

5.title: Cookies
5.plot: Craving cookies that are too cool for your childhood cookie jar?

6.title: Childhood Favorites
6.plot: Keep the kid in you hopped up on sweets at these top spots.

7.title: Sweet & Savory
7.plot: We found the spots for sweet-and-savory desserts, including sweetened tofu; and roasted-red-pepper gelato.

8.title: Small Bites
8.plot: These treats may be tiny, but are huge on flavor. The small treats include baklava and candy from Queens and Brooklyn; French classics in Chicago.

9.title: Chocolate
9.plot: Unique Sweets tries a chocolate cake that's known as the best in the world. Other chocolate sweets include a brownie sundae; a chocolate tart.

10.title: Ooey Gooey
10.plot: Join us as we taste test the best ooey gooey desserts around, including sticky buns; syrup-coated coconut cake; apple pie with spiced caramel; a sundae topped with two sauces.

11.title: Southern
11.plot: Learn a new trick or two from these Southern-inspired sweet spots. Sweets sampled included a Lady Baltimore cake; pies with surprise fillings; layer cakes.

12.title: Exotic
12.plot: Old culinary traditions are made new again at our favorite bakeries. Included: French-Japanese sweets in New York; South American treats at a Miami bakery; Boston shops with treats from Turkey and Morocco.

13.title: Fruit
13.plot: A fruit is made almost sinful again with exotic and chic desserts. The sweets include a fruit galette, fruit tart, and Popsicles.

1.title: Doughnuts
1.plot: Glazed, sprinkled, filled or even plain, there's nothing so delectable as a freshly fried doughnut.

3.title: Cravings
3.plot: Chocolates sans chocolate; brownies baked with cookies; ice cream; mini-pancakes.

4.title: Sweet Sandwiches
4.plot: Handheld desserts such as ice-cream sandwiches, sandwich cookies and donuts are featured.

5.title: Classic Twists
5.plot: Classic twists includes pies served raw, goat's milk ice cream, saltwater taffy, cakes rendered into cookies.

6.title: After School Favorites
6.plot: Cupcakes, brownies, toaster pastries, ice creams and chocolates -- there's nothing like that sweet treat to snack on when school gets out.

7.title: Breakfast Pastries
7.plot: Enticing breakfast pastries from Oregon, California, New York and Connecticut.

8.title: Italian
8.plot: A look at several New York City bakeries, featuring classic Italian sweets with a modern twist.

9.title: Brunch
9.plot: There are those who order a savory brunch, and there are those that go for gusto with something decadent and sweet.

10.title: Then and Now
10.plot: We visit pastry chefs who take time-honored traditions and turn them into something new and unique.

11.title: Frozen Treats
11.plot: It doesn't matter what the weather is like, there is always room for a frozen sweet treat.

12.title: Neighborhood Gems
12.plot: Best-selling homemade desserts from neighborhood eateries.

13.title: Sweet and Sticky
13.plot: A coast-to-coast tour of bread puddings, sticky buns, candy and more.

2.title: Coffee Break
2.plot: Dishes include cardamom spiced cake and saffron-sugar babka with coffee; crepes flavored with tiramisu and cannoli; coffee-flavored donut-bread pudding.

3.title: Kids' Treats
3.plot: Papabubble, Woolys Ice, Little Cupcake Bakeshop, Stick & Pop.

4.title: Chicago Sweet Spots
4.plot: A look at some of Chicago's innovative dessert spots.

5.title: Sweet Americana
5.plot: Brooklyn Farmacy is a soda shop that pours out a funky collection of house made nostalgic fountain treats. Chicago Diner creates classic diner desserts that taste so divine and decadent you can't even tell they're vegan!

6.title: Modern Comfort
6.plot: A glimpse inside America's most unique places for desserts, pastries and candy.

7.title: Austin Hangouts
7.plot: A visit to several eateries in Austin, Texas.

8.title: Sweet Peanut
8.plot: Treats Truck Stop is a kid friendly neighborhood bakery in Brooklyn. Two Smart Cookies is whipping up cookies that taste just like home, including the popular peanut butter hideaway.

9.title: Wild West Sweets
9.plot: Culinary sweets in Denver, Colorado. Included: a full-service cereal bar and bakery.

10.title: Global Sweets
10.plot: Taiwanese baked goods; flavorful frozen treats; French pastries in Brooklyn.

11.title: Sweet Crafters
11.plot: A look at artisan chocolates, frozen desserts on a stick, custom-made ice-cream sandwiches and other innovative places for sweets in Nashville.

12.title: Rise & Shine
12.plot: Innovative brunch creations and vegan pastries are prepared. Locations include: Darling Coffee, Short Cake Bakery, Clementine Bakery and Sky Blue Cafe.

13.title: Something Old, Something New
13.plot: Classic desserts with a modern twist.

1.title: Sweet Mash-Ups
1.plot: A look at "mash-up", or dishes that combine more than one concept to create a delicious and unique dessert.

2.title: Big Apple Breakfast
2.plot: Innovative breakfasts in New York City.

3.title: San Fran Sweet Treats
3.plot: San Fran has a well-earned reputation as a foodie paradise, so restaurants have to work hard to stand out. Three do just that, beginning with Craftsman and Wolves, followed by the Ice Cream Bar and finally Dandelion Chocolate.

4.title: Portland Sweets
4.plot: Visits to "Kara's Bake Shop" and "Quin Candy" in Portland, Oregon.

5.title: Grown-Up Goodies
5.plot: A Portland ice cream shop serves cocktails with dessert; produce added into hyper-seasonal cupcakes; unroasted and raw chocolate.

6.title: Crazy Delicious Doughnuts
6.plot: Innovative doughnut shops in the United States.

7.title: Seattle Sweets
7.plot: Innovative European-style confections in Seattle, Washington.

8.title: Southern Sweets in Atlanta
8.plot: Visiting the sweetest dessert spots in Atlanta, Georgia.

9.title: European Sweets
9.plot: Visiting Atlanta's "Little Tart Bakeshop" and a popular Italian restaurant in New York City.

10.title: Sweet Reinvention
10.plot: A small sweet shop in New York specializes in a gourmet crispy rice treat.

11.title: Capital Cravings
11.plot: Visiting innovative doughnut, cupcake and gelato eateries.

12.title: Toronto Sweets
12.plot: A look at innovative treats in Toronto.

13.title: Cool Cookie Sandwiches
13.plot: Cookie sandwiches at DC Patisserie in Washington, D.D.

1.title: Austin Sweet Freeze
1.plot: A search for cold and sweet treats in the heat of Austin, Texas.

2.title: Sweet Mornings in Sunny L.A.
2.plot: Innovative desserts in Los Angeles, California.

3.title: Old Is New Again
3.plot: Vegan cupcakes; vintage cake recipes; ice cream, flavored with champagne and hops.

4.title: Cute and Sweet
4.plot: Mini-layer cakes at the "Cake Monkey Bakery" in Los Angeles.

6.title: Chicago's Coolest Doughnuts
6.plot: The best places to go for doughnuts in Chicago.

7.title: Colorado Sweets
7.plot: Inside the "High Point Creamery" in Denver, Colorado.

8.title: Savory Sweets
8.plot: "Aiko Pops" in Denver for Raspberry and Sweet Corn tastes; "Empire Biscuits" in New York City; "Cacao Sweet and Treats" in Chicago.

9.title: Ice Cream Nation
9.plot: Inside New York's "Morgentern's Finest Ice Cream"; also, "Publican Quality" meats in Chicago.

10.title: Awesome Asheville Sweets
10.plot: Sweet treats in Asheville, North Carolina, including desserts at the "Nightbell" speakeasy.

11.title: Boston Sweets
11.plot: A look inside some of Boston's most innovative dessert spots.

13.title: Sweet Tour of Queens
13.plot: A hunt for one-of-a-kind baked treats, in the diverse borough of Queens, turns up a unique spin on the German chocolate cake, Uruguayan sandwich cookies, and a sweet concoction called the "Frankencrispie".

1.title: Surf, Sun and Sweets
1.plot: Season 6 begins with a look at incredible sweet treats found in Hawaii. Included: celebrity chef Lee Anne Wong serves brunch at "Koko Head Café". Also: "Via Gelato" and "The Pig and the Lady" are visited.

2.title: Donuts for Days
2.plot: Three unique donut shops are visited, including "Donut Friend" in Los Angeles, "Underwest Donuts" in New York and "Champion Malasadas" in Honolulu.

3.title: Deep Freeze
3.plot: Frozen treats, that are out of the ordinary, are in the spotlight. Included: Hawaiian shave ice; edgy desserts for adult palates; ice cream sandwiches made with fresh, hot funnel cakes.

4.title: L.A. Sweets
4.plot: A tour of sweet spots in Los Angeles leads to Republique's expertly crafted French pastries, Churro Borough's unique frozen treats and the light-as-air cloud cakes at Bo Nuage.

5.title: Game Changers
5.plot: Three restaurants in New York City, that have shaken up the world of sweets, are visited. First stop is Dominique Ansel Kitchen, which serves desserts made to order. Later, the staff at "Good Batch" put a new spin on ice cream sandwiches.

6.title: Low Country Love
6.plot: Highlights of a sweet trip to Charleston, South Carolina, include cinnamon and blueberry biscuits; a peanut-butter-and-Sriracha croissant; coconut cake in a jar; and something called a caramelita bar, which is part brownie, part blondie and part cookie.

7.title: Sweet Start
7.plot: Sweet ways to start the day. Included: donuts made with mashed potatoes in Portland, Maine; orange rolls and a berry sweet cheese kolache in Brooklyn, New York; and carrot-cake pancakes and fried-chicken-and-waffle sandwiches in Charleston, South Carolina.

8.title: Sweet Pick Me Up
8.plot: "Tandem Coffee and Bakery" in Portland, Maine, has coconut-almond cream pie and strawberry-almond cornmeal cake on the menu; peanut butter, dark chocolate and chipotle are combined to make the PB&C at "EVO Craft Bakery" in Charleston, South Carolina.

9.title: Maine Squeeze Sweets
9.plot: Stops in Maine include "Scratch Baking Co."; "Wicked Whoopies"; and "Catbird Creamery".

10.title: Sweet Bay Area Bites
10.plot: Highlighting unique sweets in the San Francisco Bay Area. Included: the beet pie at "Pietisserie"; cruffins at "Mr, Holmes Bakehouse"; and the chocolate frosted with hole at "Donut Savant".

11.title: Nod to Nostalgia
11.plot: Classic desserts are given a modern twist. Included: a shake with the flavors of a German chocolate cake in San Francisco, California; a unique four-layer carrot cake in Portland, Oregon; and innovative donuts from "Elsie's Parlor" in Brooklyn, New York.

12.title: Sweetlandia
12.plot: We're traveling to Portland, Oregon, to discover some of the city's most scrumptious and satisfying treats.

13.title: Sweet Bite of the Big Apple
13.plot: A trip to New York City includes ice pops made with fresh fruit; Thai street sweets; and made-to-order pancakes.

14.title: Morning Munchies
14.plot: Morning munchies are highlighted, beginning with unique ways to add fruit and veggies to breakfast. Also: a dizzying array of donuts, including glazed, chocolate malasadas and apple fritters; and muesli toast with nuts, berries and honey.

15.title: Next Level Sweets
15.plot: Cutting-edge creations are highlighted, beginning with the coconut cremeaux from Honolulu's "The Pig and the Lady". Also: a New York City made-to-order dessert restaurant, from the creator of the Cronut; and Southern cakes served in travel-friendly jars from "Sweet Lulu's Bakery on Wheels" in Charleston, South Carolina.

1.title: Sweet Twists on American Classics
1.plot: The Doughnut Project in New York City offers a chocolate cream doughnut flavored with bone marrow; Sweetness Bake Shop in Miami offers a cinnamon-spice doughnut filled with dulce de leche and topped in chocolate frosting and a crispy churro.

2.title: SoCal Cool
2.plot: Snow Monster in Long Beach offers ice cream creations, such as macaroon ice cream sandwiches and drinks topped with clouds of cotton candy; Santa Ana's Cauldron Ice Cream specializes in small batches made with liquid nitrogen served in waffle cones.

3.title: Miami Sweets
3.plot: The Salty Donut offers a buttery 24-hour brioche doughnut dough and serve topping combinations like key lime pie and peach bourbon; L.A. Sweetz offers a coconut cake dipped in dark rum and topped with dulce de leche buttercream.

4.title: Sugar High
4.plot: Brain Freeze Nitrogen Ice Cream Lab in Miami offers a mad scientist challenge to eat 30 scoops of ice cream in 30 minutes; Spot Dessert Bar in New York City serves Asian-inspired plated desserts, including a twist on the classic chocolate lava cake.

5.title: Shocking Sweets
5.plot: An underground donut spot called Donut Diva in Astoria, Queens, is frying up outrageous cake donut creations and baking unique coffee cakes; Eggloo in Manhattan builds an edible work of ice cream art, nestled into a warm, puffy, egg waffle cone.

6.title: Tasty Texas Treats
6.plot: Hypnotic Donuts in Dallas serves deep-fried treats in the form of huge fritters with developed flavors; Kate Weiser Chocolate offers crazy candy bars and smoky toffee with bacon.

8.title: Sweets All Day Long
8.plot: At the Wandering Goose in Seattle, they push the boundaries with treats like chocolate chip cookies with toffee and crispy chicken skin; Stir Crazy Baked Goods in Fort Worth, Texas, offers up an assortment of cookies, pies, scones and even quiches.

10.title: Lucious Layers
10.plot: Three unique sweet spots deliver layers of incredible flavors and texture; Union Fare Bakery in New York City is creating flavors like red velvet and birthday cake; Slab Sandwiches and Pie in Seattle creates pies in unique shapes and flavors.

12.title: Seattle Sweets 2
12.plot: Rodeo Donut prepares brioche doughnuts with a mix of spicy and sweet; Amandine Bakeshop serves French-inspired sweets like rose-flavored croissants; Hello Robin serves cookies that incorporate other treats like s'mores and cinnamon rolls.

13.title: Sweet Imagination
13.plot: Moojo uses customized ice cream sandwiches made with warm cookies to help keep Austin weird; Hail Mary in Brooklyn serves American classics with colorful, modern makeovers.

15.title: Sweet Spins in Austin
15.plot: From shortbread unicorns to herbaceous gelatos, we find a unique spin on sweet treats at every turn in Austin, Texas.

16.title: Sweet Treats in NYC
16.plot: We're on the hunt for the best sweet treats New York City has to offer, including a vegan bakery creating giant cookies and a pie shop with a mouthwatering lineup that has everyone talking.

imdb.title: Unique Sweets
plot: Visits to eateries that create unusual desserts.::anonymous
